page.description: Settings for configuring a Layout Container.

section.title: Add spacing after last control on each row

description.p: Should the control spacing be added after the last column in a row (the row must be explicitly ended by setting the control's Break property to 'After').

section.title: Add spacing before first control on each row

description.p: Should the control spacing be added before the first column in a row.
Specify one or more classes to apply to the Layout container.
Specify the in-line style for the Layout Container.
Defines the class applied to the DIV that contains the Layout Container.
Defines in-line styling that should be applied to the DIV control that contains the Layout Container.
Specify the spacing at start and end of each line and between controls (if there is more than one control on a line).
Defines the freeform layout template for the Layout Container.
The ID of the Layout Container.
Defines the type of layout to use. Available container types include:

item.name: Flow
item.description: Controls in the Layout Container "flow" from one line to the next based on the width of each control.

item.name: Freeform
item.description: Control layout is explicitly defined using HTML.

item.name: Column
item.description: Controls are placed in one or more columns.

description.p: An expression that defines whether or not the Layout Container and the controls contained within it are visible.

section.title: Wrap each control in a containing div

description.p: Specify whether or not each control in the freeform layout should be wrapped in a containing DIV element.
